dmca.title: Copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Rich Brome [mailto:rich.brome@gmail.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2006 4:32 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright violation

I would like to file a complaint regarding another customer that I feel is
infringing on my copyrights by blatantly copying the look and feel of my web
site.

The infringing web site is:

http://www.newphonereviews.com/

...which is clearly copying the look & feel of my web site:

http://www.phonescoop.com/

This is currently causing my business harm in several ways:

1. The identical design is causing people to be misled and/or confused in
thinking that the two sites are in some way related, when they are not. This
means the infringing site is unfairly benefiting from my hard-earned
positive reputation.

2. Similarly, the confusion is causing the poor content quality of the
infringing site to reflect unfairly and poorly on my brand.

3. The existence of the infringing site sets a harmful precedent that may
encourage other sites to also copy my design.

Please shut down the infringing site immediately, until such time as the
owner can modify the design so that it bears no resemblance to my site
whatsoever.

Thank you for your time and attention to this urgent matter.

Rich Brome
Phone Scoop
http://www.phonescoop.com/
rich@phonescoop.com
